name: Targasonne

guides.name: Le chaos de Targasonne - Topo Guide

overview: Targassonne, located in the French Pyrenees, is renowned for its high-quality granite boulders. Its proximity to beautiful forests and pristine nature makes it a popular spot for climbers and boulderers. The best season to visit is spring and autumn, and it's known for its challenging yet rewarding problems.

Targassonne, ubicada en los Pirineos franceses, es famosa por sus bloques de granito de alta calidad. Su proximidad a hermosos bosques y la naturaleza virgen la convierte en un lugar popular para escaladores y boulderers.
